name: Quizlet.nl Dark Design
description: The first Design for the new Quizlet.nl. Works for both Google Chrome and FireFox
obsoletion_message: Deleted by admin - contains non-loading images - Dec 5 2012
additional_info:
Version 3.0.1.1 -- Moved the list a bit so it looks better.
Version 3.0.1 -- Updated the look of a li inside a ul inside a blockquote.
Version 3.0 -- Updated the whole code to be more clean. Fixed a few other errors. 
Version 2.6.5.1 -- New BBCode's are now supported and colored correctly
Version 2.6.5.1 -- Makes the poll text color black in forum posts
Version 2.6.5 -- Changed the matching method to regex. It always matches the quizlet.nl url, except on the /go subsection. http://www.quizlet.nl/forum/history.php will have this style, http://www.quizlet.nl/go/4/welke-superheld-ben-jij/ will not.
Version 2.6.4.1 -- Uploaded some of the custom pictures used to a different server. They are now loaded a lot faster.
Version 2.6.4 -- Changed the color of a "a" inside the "rechts" class to aqua. Makes it a lot easier to see a link if you are someone's profile
Version 2.6.3 -- Changed the color of a "strong" inside a "p" to white. Polls and such will now be more readable. Also, the standard color of something that isn't colored is now white.
Version 2.6.2 -- Changed the background to counteract the JB background April Fools joke.
